item.description:
"Little Grove" Boston Children's Music Group Concert

Musicians and teachers from “Little Grove” in Boston are bringing their program to LCM. Children enjoy being a part of the musical experience, using their bodies, voices, and real instruments. Little Grove programs sometimes include puppets, bubbles, balls, or a parachute, but they always include FUN! Free with paid admission to the museum (or completely free to members).

Here is some information on their interactive music concerts:  LITTLE GROVE

Concert is free with museum admission ($6), and completely free to members of the museum.
item.how_to_find_us: Just come on in the front door

group.name: The Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group

item.name: Free Children's Concert at the LUTZ!
